Instance.description: Zone Director with a weekly scheduler.

Tunable.name: allow_open_street_director
Tunable.description: When set this will allow a weekly schedule zone director to start an open street director. However if this is False then the open street zone director won't start up and that can lead to things like seasonal conditional layers not spawning and such.

TunableList.name: scheduled_situations
TunableList.description: Mapping of week to possible schedule of situations for that day of the week.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.
